nodes.excerpt: The Koan Free tier is a great first step in the journey, making it easy for teams to discover a more transparent, collaborative way of working. Teams in the habit of sharing status, recognizing wins, and heading off concerns early will naturally raise the bar for everyone else around them.

localize.description: Koan免费层是这个旅程中的第一步，让团队很容易发现一种更透明、更协作的工作方式。习惯于分享状态、认可胜利和尽早解决疑虑的团队，自然会提高周围其他人的标准。
localize.tagline: 使用我们的OKR和状态跟踪平台，有目的的工作。

nodes.excerpt: Push a button and send user stories in your product spec to Jira. Fable will also keep the spec fresh with any changes made to the tickets on Jira. No more copy + pasting from Docs into Jira, no more stale spec!
nodes.title: Fable - Sync user stories and requirements between Docs and Jira
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 按下按钮，将产品规格中的用户故事发送到Jira上。Fable还将通过对Jira上的票据所做的任何更改来保持规格的新鲜感。不再需要从Docs复制+粘贴到Jira中，不再有陈旧的规格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之间同步用户故事和需求。

localize.description: 按下按鈕，將產品規格中的用戶故事發送到Jira上。Fable還將通過對Jira上的票據所做的任何更改來保持規格的新鮮感。不再需要從Docs複製+粘貼到Jira中，不再有陳舊的規格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之間同步用戶故事和需求。

nodes.excerpt: Founder Content is a curated list of the World’s best content from world-class Founders. It’s real-time, updated daily and helps aspiring Founders get meaningful guidance from the best-of-the-best. It's for Founders that give a s#*t about other Founders.

localize.description: Founder Content是一个由世界级创始人精心策划的世界最佳内容列表。它是实时的，每天更新，帮助有抱负的创始人从最好的人那里获得有意义的指导。它是为那些关心其他创始人的创始人准备的。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的创始人资源策划列表❤️。

nodes.excerpt: With PayRequest Pre-Authorization you can temporary hold an amount on your customers credit card, during the hold period the funds are unavailable to the customer, the funds can be captured if needed, like checking out of a hotel, or rental security deposits.
nodes.title: PayRequest Pre-Authorization - Send customers pre-authorization payment links
nodes.author: Geert Jan Sloos

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
nodes.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。

nodes.excerpt: Browser Stealth Mode is a chrome extension that lets you browse and watch anything without worrying about who's looking over your shoulder. You can toggle stealth mode in your current tab. Stealth mode includes grayscale, hiding images/videos, and muting tab.

localize.description: 浏览器隐身模式是一个chrome扩展，让你浏览和观看任何东西，而不用担心谁在看你的肩膀。你可以在当前标签中切换隐身模式。隐身模式包括灰度、隐藏图片/视频和静音标签。
localize.tagline: 掩饰您的互联网浏览活动

localize.description: 瀏覽器隱身模式是一個chrome擴展，讓你瀏覽和觀看任何東西，而不用擔心誰在看你的肩膀。你可以在當前標籤中切換隱身模式。隱身模式包括灰度、隱藏圖片/視頻和靜音標籤。

nodes.excerpt: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.

nodes.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.

nodes.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
nodes.title: Partnerbow - Easy way to request, negotiate and approve price estimates.
nodes.author: Taavi Raidma

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

nodes.excerpt: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
nodes.title: fireflies.ai + x.ai - Record & transcribe meetings scheduled via x.ai
nodes.author: Krish Ramineni

localize.description: fireflies.ai与x.ai合作，将整个会议流程自动化，从日程安排到记录 📣记录和抄录x.ai会议 🔍搜索回溯您的对话 📝与您的团队分享总结和笔记。
localize.tagline: 通过x.ai记录和抄写预定的会议。

localize.description: fireflies.ai與x.ai合作，將整個會議流程自動化，從日程安排到記錄 📣記錄和抄錄x.ai會議 🔍搜索回溯您的對話 📝與您的團隊分享總結和筆記。
localize.tagline: 通過x.ai記錄和抄寫預定的會議。

nodes.excerpt: Slid is the smartest note-taking Chrome extension for online learning. Take notes with captures from videos, build your own knowledge database, share the knowledge anywhere you want.
nodes.title: Slid - Capture knowledge from online videos, courses, and webinars
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: Slid是最智能的在线学习笔记Chrome扩展。利用从视频中捕捉的内容做笔记，建立自己的知识数据库，随时随地分享知识。
localize.tagline: 从在线视频、课程和网络研讨会中获取知识。

localize.description: Slid是最智能的在線學習筆記Chrome擴展。利用從視頻中捕捉的內容做筆記，建立自己的知識數據庫，隨時隨地分享知識。
localize.tagline: 從在線視頻、課程和網絡研討會中獲取知識。
